name: Jerry Broke The Wall
description:
Jerry broke the 4th wall by talking to You, The Player. The Anti-Jerry Special Forces are on their way to brutally erase Jerry from existance and they will do whatever they need to stop him from making the prophecy come true.

Help Jerry to survive long enough to fulfill his purpose by jumping, sliding and dodging in this parkour runner game full of quick-time events! 

I dare you to beat the game on Jerry Mode, the highest difficulty.

Download the game for better performance.

Android version available!

How to play:

Press "The Action Button" to perform an action which is automaticaly chosen for the moment

Press "R" to restart the whole game

This game was made in about 7 days for the VimJam 3 game jam.

Focus: Multi-Use

Theme: Turn Up The Heat

Music and art were made by myself during the jam.

v1.1

Headphones recommended!
